newsitem.title: USA: TRISM Inc says will eliminate positions.
newsitem.headline: TRISM Inc says will eliminate positions.

text.p: - TRISM Inc said on Tuesday that it will eliminate the position of president and chief operating officer as part of an ongoing business reorganization.
The responsibilities of those posts will be assumed by TRISM's chairman and chief executive, James Revie, the company said in a statement.
John Kilcullen, who currently holds the eliminated positions, will leave the company by the end of the month, it added.
"Unfortunately, having consolidated and streamlined four individual business units into a single administrative operation, we no longer require a separate president and COO function," Revie said.
TRISM Inc is a trucking company that specializes in the transportation of heavy over-dimensional equipment.
